rows.label: bf03090100_0010
rows.name:
What's wrong? 
Aren't you the Holy Grail?

rows.label: bf03090100_0020
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: bf03090100_0030
rows.name: Something's not right here...

rows.label: bf03090100_0032
rows.name: This man, is he...?!

rows.label: bf03090100_0040
rows.name:
That's all you've got? 
 You call that 'power'?

rows.label: bf03090100_0050
rows.name:
We'll show you!
We'll show you what me and Homura are made of!

rows.label: bf03090100_0060
rows.name: He dodged?!

rows.label: bf03090100_0070
rows.name:
Of course I did!
You're so slow I'm getting sleepy.

rows.label: bf03090100_0080
rows.name: How about this then?

rows.label: bf03090100_0090
rows.name: Hmph.

rows.label: bf03090100_0100
rows.name:
Rex, wait!
I can't supply power this fast!

rows.label: bf03090100_0110
rows.name:
Nowhere left to run!
Eat this!

rows.label: bf03090100_0120
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Uh?

rows.label: bf03090100_0130
rows.name: Playtime's over. Take this!

rows.label: bf03090100_0135
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]

rows.label: bf03090100_0140
rows.name: Ah!

rows.label: bf03090100_0150
rows.name:
You're new to being a Driver, 
aren't you, kid?

rows.label: bf03090100_0160
rows.name: Drivers, see.

rows.label: bf03090100_0170
rows.name:
We borrow our Blades' energy...
channel it into our weapons...

rows.label: bf03090100_0175
rows.name: And let rip with an Art!

rows.label: bf03090100_0180
rows.name:
There's a natural limit 
to how much you can store.

rows.label: bf03090100_0190
rows.name:
If you just keep firing off Arts 
without thinking ahead

rows.label: bf03090100_0192
rows.name:
even the Holy Grail
will run out of energy.

rows.label: bf03090100_0200
rows.name: W-what...?

rows.label: bf03090100_0210
rows.name: H-huh?

rows.label: bf03090100_0220
rows.name: Name's Vandham.

rows.label: bf03090100_0222
rows.name:
I work as a mercenary 
in the village up ahead.

rows.label: bf03090100_0230
rows.name: Merc?

rows.label: bf03090100_0240
rows.name: Come on!

rows.label: bf03090100_0250
rows.name:
Thanks for letting me test the Holy Grail's 
power.
Let me treat you to a meal.

rows.label: bf03090100_0260
rows.name: Hahahahaha!

rows.label: bf03090100_0270
rows.name:
I realized it when 
I took his attack earlier...

rows.label: bf03090100_0280
rows.name:
It seems he never intended to fight 
seriously from the start.

rows.label: bf03090100_0290
rows.name: What's the deal with that old guy...
